trans-unit.source: Thrown when ADSI returns an error during an operation to update the store.
trans-unit.target: Et når ADSI returnerer en feil under en operasjon for å oppdatere butikken.

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> class.
trans-unit.target: Standardkonstruktøren initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>klassen.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen initialiseres til en system-angitt melding som beskriver problemet.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen tar hensyn til gjeldende system kultur.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen initialiseres til `null`.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte feilmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen satt til verdien for `message`.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `message` er `null`, <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen initialiseres til en system-angitt melding.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Teksten i feilmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instances.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"> </xref> klassen fra den angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>forekomster.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref>
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som inneholder informasjonen som kreves for å serialisere den nye<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref>
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder kilden for serialisert dataflyt som er knyttet til den nye <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"> </xref> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with the specified error message and specified nested exception.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte feilmelding og angitt nestede unntak.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen satt til verdien for `message` og <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen satt til verdien for `innerException`.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `message` er `null`, <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen initialiseres til en system-angitt melding.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>initialiseres til `null`.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Teksten i feilmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: A nested exception.
trans-unit.target: Et nestet unntak.

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with the specified error message and specified error code.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte feilmelding og angitte feilkoden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A> property set to the value of `errorCode`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen satt til verdien for `message` og <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A>egenskapen satt til verdien for `errorCode`.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `message` er `null`, <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen initialiseres til en system-angitt melding.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of the message.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: An error code.
trans-unit.target: En feilkode.

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with the specified error message, the specified nested exception, and the specified error code.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"> </xref> klasse angitte feilmeldingen, det angitte nestede unntaket og angitte feilkoden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`, and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A> is set to `errorCode`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen satt til verdien for `message` og <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen satt til verdien for `innerException`, og <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A>er satt til `errorCode`.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException.ErrorCode%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `message` er `null`, <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen initialiseres til en system-angitt melding.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>initialiseres til `null`.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of the message.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for meldingen.

trans-unit.source: A nested exception.
trans-unit.target: Et nestet unntak.

trans-unit.source: An error code.
trans-unit.target: En feilkode.

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer error code.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en feilkode heltall.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The system will return 0 (zero) in the exception error code property if no underlying error was received from a win32 API.
trans-unit.target: Systemet gjenopptar 0 (null) i egenskapen unntak kode hvis ingen underliggende feilen ble mottatt fra en win32 API.

trans-unit.source: Callers need to distinguish between 0 (zero) and a valid win32 error code.
trans-unit.target: Brukere må skille mellom 0 (null) og en gyldig win32-feilkode.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalOperationException"> </xref> klasse serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute unntak objektet overføres via en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [XML og SOAP-serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som har datatypen serialiserte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.
